custom_css: a {padding-left: 20px; padding-right: 18px; padding-top: 12px; padding-bottom: 12px; font-size: 24px; color: #f0bfb6; font-weight: 500; border-left: solid; border-right: solid; border-top: solid; border-bottom: solid; border-width: 2px; transition: background-color 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;}
